Ensure student journalism survives PERIOD Donate today PERIOD

By  Paul KirkApril  

The Orchesis Spring Dance Concert will feature a variety of dances and styles will range from modern folk social tap and jazz PERIOD

The concert is sponsored by the physical education department and the dance department of NIU on April   and  at  p.m PERIOD in Anderson Hall Room  PERIOD

We will have a latino merenge two african numbers tap numbers mexican jazz and modern musica little of everything said Danielle Jay associate professor of dance and physical education PERIOD

Orchesis once known as NIU Company Dancers is a performing dance group sponsored by the physical education department PERIOD

The group is advised by Jay and Janet Berkes instructors of dance and physical education PERIOD

Three dance works by Jay are included in the concert La Croix Ibo and El Jarabe Tapitio. jay pointed out that most of the works were choreographed by students however PERIOD

All choreography is done by students with faculty supervision she said PERIOD

The groups name was changed to Orchesis after several years as Company Dancers of NIU she said PERIOD

The group has met Tuesdays and Thursdays through the entire year practicing in preparation for the show PERIOD The Orchesis group is made up of dancers from every level of ability she said PERIOD

Orchesis is made up of people with an interest in dance but who have other majors and people who have a major emphasis in dance she said PERIOD Its for anyone with any level of ability. the Latino dance group Dance Quente will be guest performers this year at the Orchesis concert PERIOD Dance Quente coordinated by Gloria Juarez was created to perform Latino dances for Hispanic Month PERIOD

The Latino group was then invited to perform in Orchesis by Jay who also advises Dance Quente PERIOD

Dance Quente last performed in the Martin Luther King Commons on April  PERIOD Juarez said at that time that they were looking forward to performing in Orchesis and that they were grateful for the invitation PERIOD

Orchesis is for people who just want to dance and love to dance Jay said PERIOD

The Orchesis spring dance will be accessible to the disabled PERIOD A fee of . for students children and senior citizens and . for adults is appreciated by the company PERIOD
